We’re in a national housing crisis:
🏠 We have 37 affordable units for every 100 low-income households.
💵 The avg rent for 2-bedroom apts is 3x the minimum wage.

We must act. My bill w/ @WhipClyburn would provide monthly tax credits for renters & support inclusive zoning laws.

Republicans in the Senate should stop refusing to safeguard the basic foundation of our democracy in the face of confirmed, systematic attack. 

We *must* secure our elections and #ProtectOurDemocracy.

Hookworm in rural Alabama.

Chagas as far north as Pennsylvania.

RT @peteschroeder AOC kind of tying Zuckerberg in knots here on political ads.

Q: Can I run ads telling voters the wrong election date?
Z: No.
Q: So you are fact-checking politics ads?
Z: For specific things.
Q: Can I run ads in GOP primaries saying they backed my Green New Deal?
Z: I don't know.
